sentences.en: a big round table
sentences.cn: 一张大圆桌

sentences.en: a delivery truck making the rounds; students going the rounds in the entertainment district.
sentences.cn: 挨户送货的卡车；逐一在娱乐区玩耍的学生

sentences.en: a sculpture in the round.
sentences.cn: 立体雕像

sentences.en: everything round about was covered with snow.
sentences.cn: 周围的一切都被雪覆盖了。

sentences.en: Gather round! I have an important announcement to make.
sentences.cn: 大家围拢来！我有重要事情要宣布。

sentences.en: Graham glanced round, startled by the voice behind him.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆听到背后的声音一惊，回头扫了一眼。

sentences.en: He put his arm gently round her waist.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地搂着她的腰。

sentences.en: He tramped hurriedly round the lake towards the garden.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆地迈着沉重的步伐绕过湖边向花园走去。

sentences.en: his father insisted he went to university to round out his education.
sentences.cn: 他的父亲坚持要他上大学来圆满完成他的教育。

sentences.en: I kept the key on a chain round my neck.
sentences.cn: 我给钥匙穿了根链子挂在脖子上。

sentences.en: I moved on round the big house to reach my pad.
sentences.cn: 我绕过大房子走向我的公寓。

sentences.en: I played a round of golf on Sunday morning.
sentences.cn: 星期天早上我打了一场高尔夫球。

sentences.en: I shivered and pulled my scarf more tightly round my neck.
sentences.cn: 我打了个寒战，用围巾把脖子围得更紧了。

sentences.en: in the afternoon the cows are rounded up for milking.
sentences.cn: 下午牛被驱拢在一起挤奶。

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: It was unbelievably dramatic as lightning crackled all round the van.
sentences.cn: 闪电在货车周围炸开时，情景异常壮观。

sentences.en: It would take three to six hours for a round trip.
sentences.cn: 往返行程需要3到6个小时。

sentences.en: Jamie’s eyes grew round with delight.
sentences.cn: 杰米高兴得瞪圆了眼睛。

sentences.en: Leonard pottered round the greenhouse, tying up canes for the tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 伦纳德在温室里悠然自得地给西红柿绑上撑杆。

sentences.en: round off the spars with a soft plastic fitting.
sentences.cn: 用软的塑料工具把晶石修圆磨光。

sentences.en: She had small feet and hands and a flat, round face.
sentences.cn: 她的手脚都很小，脸又扁又圆。

sentences.en: She panics when people pop in unexpectedly, rushing round plumping cushions.
sentences.cn: 一群人冷不防地冒出来，跑来跑去地拍松垫子，这把她吓坏了。

sentences.en: She showed me round and introduced me to everybody.
sentences.cn: 她领着我四处看了看，将我介绍给每个人。

sentences.en: She was sitting in an armchair with blankets wrapped round her.
sentences.cn: 她坐在扶手椅中，身上裹着毯子。

sentences.en: Stars appeared everywhere, spinning round and round, faster and faster.
sentences.cn: 满眼金星乱转，而且越转越快。

sentences.en: The ballroom’s huge, with windows all the way round .
sentences.cn: 舞厅很大，四周都是窗户。

sentences.en: The news quickly made the rounds. A piece of juicy gossip is going the rounds.
sentences.cn: 消息很快就传开了；生动的闲话正传播开去

sentences.en: There was a lovely courtyard with tables all round .
sentences.cn: 有一个漂亮的庭院，四周都是桌子。

sentences.en: There's a zoo round here? That's dandy for my kids.
sentences.cn: 这附近有个动物园？我的孩子们一定会很高兴的。

sentences.en: they arrived round about nine.
sentences.cn: 他们大约九点到达。

sentences.en: they arrived round about nine.
sentences.cn: 他们大约九点到达。

sentences.en: they arrived round about nine.
sentences.cn: 他们大约九点到达。

sentences.en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentences.cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

sentences.en: We sat round the fire to keep ourselves warm.
sentences.cn: 我们围坐在火边取暖。

sentences.en: We sat round the table playing cards.
sentences.cn: 我们围桌而坐玩纸牌。

sentences.en: When he turned round I recognised him immediately.
sentences.cn: 他转过身来，我立即认出了他。

words.tran_cn: 全面地；严厉地；直率地；圆圆地
酒鬼；惯犯；看夜人；搓圆机；巡回者
绕行；使变圆；把…弄成整数（round的ing形式）
在周围；迂回地；朝反方向；挨个
圆；循环；一回合；[数]圆形物
进展；变圆；[公路]环行；发胖
完成；围捕；[水运]绕行；弄圆

phrases.tran_cn: (医生)巡回出诊；一系列的访问(常与动词make连用)
v. 说服；（消息）传开来；走动；旅行；避免
形状完整并可脱离背景的
兜个圈子；闲逛；漫步；(乘车船)游逛

phrases.phrase: make the rounds 或 go the rounds
phrases.tran_cn: 在众人中传播：一个人接一个人的传播
完成；使完美；把…修圆磨光；圆满结束
集拢（分散的人)，赶拢；驱拢（牲口）
赶拢：把（牛群）从不同的地方赶到一块儿
巡回，巡视(如夜间医生查病房等)

trans.tran_cn: （在）周围，围绕，到处，转过来，绕弯，依次，到某地，大概
trans.tran_en: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone

trans.tran_cn: 轮，局，回合，惯常活动，递送路线，一巡饮料，一阵，一枪，圆块
围（绕），绕过，遍及，基于，克服，大概

trans.tran_en: on the other side of something, or to the other side of it without going through it or over it
